description: BTree-based persistent dict-like objects (regular dict and ordered) that can beused as base classes.This is a bit of a heavyweight solution, as every c.dict.Dict (andc.dict.OrderedDict) is at least 3 persistent objects.  Keep this inmind if you intend to create lots and lots of these.To build, run python bootstrapbootstrap.py and then binbuildoutfrom this directory.  A clean, non-system Python is strongly recommended.
longdescription: BTree-based persistent dict-like objects (regular dict and ordered) that can beused as base classes.This is a bit of a heavyweight solution, as every c.dict.Dict (andc.dict.OrderedDict) is at least 3 persistent objects.  Keep this inmind if you intend to create lots and lots of these.To build, run python bootstrapbootstrap.py and then binbuildoutfrom this directory.  A clean, non-system Python is strongly recommended.
